question:
[Gregory] likes to watch baseball with his brother. His name is [Charles]. [Sarah]'s husband, [Carlos], surprised her with tickets to a football game for their anniversary. [Carlos] took his daughter [Faye] to the park. [Mary], Emilie´s sister went with them. [Mary] asked her daughter, [Ashley], if she would like to go to a movie with her on Saturday night. [Sarah] and her daughter [Faye] went to see a movie yesterday and then got ice cream afterwards. [Julie] went to her brother [Gregory]'s birthday party [Ashley] and her aunt, [Julie], went to the deli. They got a half a pound of corned beef, and two pounds of salami.
Question: How is [Charles] related to [Faye]?
